name: Brutal Doggal: Territorial Pissings
description:
This project was made during a development class at LUDUS Académie. We had to make a multiplayer game with an asymetric gameplay on Unreal Engine.

The first player plays as Doggal "The Brutal", a woman who wants to walk her dog as fast as possible, and get to her destination.
The second player plays as Brutal the Dog, who only wants to mark his territory, and to do so, he has to urinate on the three fire hydrants.

The game finishes when Doggal gets to her destination, and then her time and Brutal's score are displayed on screen.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Use the ZQSD/Arrow keys to move around
  • Use the SHIFT key to run and extend the leash connecting you to the other player
  • As Brutal the dog, use the SPACE/Numpad_0 key to jump

HOW TO LAUNCH A GAME

First, make sure you are connected to the same local network.
Then one of the player may select Host LAN and the second Join LAN

CREDITS

  • Game Design : Gaëtan Piou, Romain Schlotter
  • Programming : Romain Schlotter, Gaëtan Piou
  • Level Design : Gaëtan Piou
  • Music : Gaëtan Piou (inspired by Territorial Pissings by Nirvana)
